author: Lauren Strapagiel Buzzfeed News Reporter
title: Canada Has No Chill About This Pineapple On Pizza Business - BuzzFeed News
text:
ID: 10584595 7. Truly it only seems like a matter of time until Justin Trudeau himself chimes in. 
The people of Canada demand to know where @JustinTrudeau stands in the #PineappleOnPizza debate. It is our national pizzerian heritage! ‚Äî Eve Forster üë©üèº‚Äçüî¨ (@EveForster) ID: 10585959 8. Like I said, just absolutely no goddamn chill. 
I'm really tired of this pineapple on pizza bashing. It's a national treasure. Give it the Order of Canada. ‚Äî Andrew Livingstone (@Andrew_Livi) ID: 10586148 9. This has become a point of national pride. 
I'm so happy Canada is standing up for its beliefs on the world stage. #pineappleonPizza https://t.co/E70qXfyv8j ‚Äî Tori Wickheim (@twickvic) ID: 10585973 10. And while some of our southern neighbours seem grateful for our most terrible food invention‚Ä¶ 
Big day for those of us who enjoy the sweet tang of pineapple on our pizzas. Thanks for looking out for us, @canada ‚Äî Lisa Thomson (@lisacthomson) 11. Others know there‚Äôs no pride in pineapple.
